alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Haakon; Jackson; Mellette; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 05 at 2:28AM MDT until April 07 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON MDT /1 PM CDT/ TODAY TO 6 PM MDT /7 PM CDT/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwestern South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation and the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...From noon MDT /1 PM CDT/ today to 6 PM MDT /7 PM CDT/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...The high winds may blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Persons outdoors should watch for flying or falling objects that may injure you. If you are driving, be prepared for sudden wind gusts that can cause you to lose control of your vehicle, especially on open stretches, or as you approach the crest of hills. Also be alert for debris or dust blowing across the road.
